title: Lady From Tang Dynasty
overview: Yun Luo Li, the eldest daughter of the Yun family, suffers from a car accident and accidentally loses her memory after waking up. She bumps into Du Si Tang, the president of the Du Group, in the hospital. Yun Luo Li had a sense of familiarity with Du Si Tang, and Du Si Tang also had an inexplicable heartbeat reaction to Yun Luo Li approaching. In order to find out what happened, Yun Luo Li kept approaching and testing Du Si Tang, and the relationship between the two also heated up as they got to know each other. But then the loss of the secret recipe handed down by the Du family made Du Si Tang suspect Yun Luo Li's strange behavior. Disappointed, Yun Luo Li left, determined to use the ancient wine-making techniques of the Tang Dynasty to re-develop the Yunjia wine industry and create the "Datang Style Garden". In the end, the truth about the loss of the secret recipe was found out, and Yun and Du finally reunited.
